main.core.uploader package¶

Submodules¶

main.core.uploader.awsUploader module¶

class main.core.uploader.awsUploader.awsUploader¶

Bases: dbUploader

AWS-specific implementation for uploading a MySQL dump to an RDS instance.

close()¶
connect()¶
get_endpoint(instance_id)¶

Get the current endpoint address of an RDS instance by ID.

get_or_create_endpoints(aws_upload_config)¶

Retrieves or creates RDS instances for source and destination. Adds correct SG rules and updates config with the new endpoints. Raises exceptions on error.

set_mysql_connection_details(endpoint, config)¶
set_postgres_connection_details(endpoint, config)¶
upload(dump_path)¶
upload_postgres(dump_path)¶
